song_lyrics: Kanchan kalash liye shītal jal, sanak sanandan ṭhāḍe.....1
Chhappan bhog chhattīsahu vyanjan, vividh prakār samvāre;
Kar-jore Kamalā liye thārī, jīmiye prānaso pyāre.......2
Dadhi mākhan pakavān miṭhāī, khaṭ ras khāṭe khāre;
Ruchi ruchi grās bharo more jīvan, parat hū paiyā tumhāre.....3
Akṣharpati Harikṛuṣhṇadev Prabhu, nij jan hit tanu dhāre;
Premānand panavāro zūṭhako, māgat ṭhādo dvāre......4
title: Bhojan jamīye Nāth hamāre

metadata.kirtan_info:
2-1283: Sadguru Premanand Swami

Category: Thal
